name: FlyWheel
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fly wheel
des:
Flywheel's is changing the current landscape of education.

Our mission is to teach you any subject, anywhere, and anytime you want. And we don't want to just "teach" you. We want to teach you in a way that helps you become an expert, and most importantly, have fun in the process.

We are starting with two topics: 'Math- Addition', 'Math-Subtraction', ideal for kids ages 4-12. 
For our little friends to relax, we have also added a third topic, story time.

The teaching starts with Level 1 (single-digit numbers) and auto-upgrades the student to the next level if five consecutive responses are correct.

The skill will also keep track of where and how many mistakes you are making, and will take a few minutes to teach the user some helpful tricks.

Give it a try! We would love to hear from you on how we did and what can we improve.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
